body: If an abrakarn viper confirms a critical hit against an opponent with its bite attack, the opponent must succeed at a DC 23 Will save or be confused for 1 round (as lesser confusion ). The save DC is Charisma-based and includes a +9 racial bonus.
name: Confusing Critical
